Title: Authorizes and directs the public service commission and the New York state energy research and development authority to conduct a study on peaker plant electric generating facilities on Long Island
Summary: Authorizes and directs the public service commission and the New York state energy research and development authority to conduct a study on peaker plant electric generating facilities on Long Island.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to authorizing and directing the public service commission and the New York state energy research and development authority to conduct a study on peaker plant electric generating facilities on Long Island; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
